description: Try our easy to follow Yoghurt-Coated Grapes & Strawberries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chocolate-covered fruit,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Strawberry,Grape,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Yoghurt-Coated Grapes & Strawberries Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line two baking trays with baking paper. Transfer yoghurt to a bowl. Wash grapes and pat dry, then dip into yoghurt to coat, allowing excess to drip off. Place on trays. Repeat with strawberries.
Freeze for 2 hours until solid, then transfer to an airtight, freezer-safe container in a single layer. Note: These treats melt quickly, so only take a serve at a time from the freezer.
